name: Thanis Sriklindee
description: '''Thanis Sriklindee''' ({{langx|th|ธนิสร์ ศรีกลิ่นดี}}) or simply known as '''Ajaan Thanis''' (อาจารย์ธนิสร์, อ.ธนิสร์) is a Thai [[musician]] and former member of [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]], a famous and popular [[Thai rock]]  and [[Phleng phuea chiwit]] (เพลงเพื่อชีวิต; lit: songs for life) band.
